ModMetaData.name: Veinminer R1.0
ModMetaData.author: Toasteh, Updated by Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.2 update to R1.0 original mod:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=944099898
This mod lets you designate all connected minerals to be mined, even if you can't see them.
this is Not my own work, this is just an update to make it compatible with R1.0
removed DesignationCategoryDefs.xml switched to xpath patch method to improve compatability (Thanks Mehni)
